name: Roll Dem Bones
description:
Put your luck to the test in this thrilling action/adventure dungeon crawler! Every roll of the dice puts your fate at risk by deciding everything from what skills you possess to what weapons you use. Can you survive this game of chance?

Controls:

W / A / S / D - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Left Click - Attack

Q - Switch Weapon

E - Roll Dice

Space - Jump

Team:

Jalyn  English - Programmer

Phu Le - 3D/Level Artist

Nick Maclean - Programmer

Ariana Mendez - Level Artist

Kenny Rosillo - Level Designer/Artist

Shelley Sugiharto - 2D Artist

David Teran - Sound Designer
